Reviews.Title: “Nice relaxing Hotel to stay in..Staff helpful”
Reviews.Author: lon1971
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel running berlin hotel quiet location 4 tram stops form alexanderplatz train nice quaint hotel staff receptionist day cleaning ur single nice free internet acess nice italian resturant directly road theres resturant bar hotel staff friendly helpful excellent english overall happy stay suited perfectly run berlin marathon 2011 stay

Reviews.Title: “Total rip off...misleading website...not worth it...very disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: bjd1985
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel girlfriend 4 nights october 2010 birthday 1st visit berlin lot time spent internet chose offered value money terms midrange hotels based hotel website services photos etc misleading night didn’t double bed 2 singles lights dim dark day changed favour single bed actually sleep bit nicer tiny bed wasn’t comfy shabby towels thin worn coarse top night clubbing couldn’t close blinds morning sleep none i’ve written review trip advisor time hotel website misleading feng shui charge rates nice midrange 34 star hotels none service comfort expect disappointed birthday weekend spoil ourselves € 350 wasted crap hotel location ok you’re looking stay value midrange hotel isn’t don’t stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice, simple hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: briochelover
Reviews.Content: clean comfortable breakfast ample staff helpful enjoyed location easily reached tram alexanderplatz neighborhood pretty dining options drawback hotel front desk 11pm morning happens magnetic key card enter hotel doesnt

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, small and clean in the centre of Berlin - all you need!”
Reviews.Author: snowfence
Reviews.Content: expecting grandeur luxury pampered stay rated hotel completely sufficient clean shower baths tubs furniture minimalistic traditional according feng shui principle extremely quiet slept hotel amazing price payed single roomnight tram reach alexanderplatz 5 minutes ohso hip prenzlauer berg doors 510 minute walk liked lots space am thinking travellers north america spacious hotels highly recommendable travelers buget spend time hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Feng Shui Hotel Melarose
HotelInfo.Address: Greifswalder Str. 199, 10405 Berlin, Germany
